img_above_text:
When you get to the edge, look down to see a muddy clearing. Down here, you can find the next optional boss, which is the final frog Lang-Baw-Baw.
## Lang-Baw-Baw Boss Fight and Guide
img_below_text:
When you first drop in on Lang-Baw-Baw, a load of soldiers will also appear. You can ignore these and let Lang-Baw-Baw tackle them; they make for a good distraction so you can focus on hitting the frog while it attacks the soldiers.
![Foothills Walkthrough \(33\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/b/be/Foothills_Walkthrough_%2833%29.png)

img_summary:
1. **Summary of the Image**:  
The image depicts the optional boss Lang-Baw-Baw, a large, menacing frog, in a muddy clearing surrounded by a forested area. The scene is atmospheric, with shadows and mist emphasizing the tension of the encounter. A player character is shown facing the frog, setting the stage for the boss fight.

2. **Narrative Role**:  
The image visually introduces the Lang-Baw-Baw boss fight, highlighting the environment where the battle takes place and the imposing nature of the frog. It complements the guide by providing a visual reference for players as they prepare to engage the boss and navigate the accompanying soldiers.
